DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics (PK), and efficacy of various repeat-dose regimens of KB003 in subjects with active Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) who have had an inadequate prior treatment outcome from biologic therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Study of KB003 In Biologics-Inadequate Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: At least 6 swollen and at least 6 tender joints Creactive Protein (CRP) > Upper Limit Normal (ULN) Prior inadequate response from biologic therapy Stable regimens of concomitant RA therapies Unstable medical conditions
